column4: hi all, I'm trying to get sound working in firefox under ubuntu.  I can play cd's and mp3's but links to either format from firefox are silent.  do i need w3codecs (can't find them in synaptic) or some other magic setting?
what do you mean with "links to euther format"?
do you have a plugin that can handle these?
so you should install a plugin that can handle these files
